attributes.action: Petition against sending depleted uranium munitions to the Ukraine.
attributes.additional_details:
This has the potential to escalate the war in the Ukraine to a state once entered cannot be de-escalated triggering nuclear war and the end of the British Isles and potentially the end of mankind.

 It doesn’t matter we are told this is safe. President Putin of Russia has threatened to escalate this and respond in kind with his doomsday weapon called Poseidon. 

We need to stop and think before risking any more innocent lives.
attributes.background: Stop munitions containing depleted uranium from being sent to the Ukraine.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/635335
